entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
